subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Phillies won for the fifth time in six games, and the Mets’ Justin Turner could be headed to the disabled list with a sprained ankle, thinning an already stretched infield.
snippet: The Phillies won for the fifth time in six games, and the Mets’ Justin Turner could be headed to the disabled list with a sprained ankle, thinning an already stretched infield.
